description: Post content to social media platforms (Twitter, Instagram, Facebook)

platform.description: Social media platform to post to

text.description: Post content/caption (max 280 chars for Twitter, 2200 for Instagram/Facebook)

media_urls.description: Array of media URLs (images/videos) to include in post

schedule_for.description: ISO 8601 timestamp to schedule post for later (optional, defaults to immediate)
